# Pix.js sdk

Pix.js is a set of tools for integrating PIX payments into your JavaScript/TypeScript projects

## Pix Qrcode

- [Installation](https://pix-js.vercel.app/docs/getting-started/qrcode): Install guide for pix qrcode parser and factory
- [Dynamic QRCode](https://pix-js.vercel.app/docs/getting-started/qrcode/dynamic-qrcode)
- [Static QRCode](https://pix-js.vercel.app/docs/getting-started/qrcode/static-qrcode)

## Pix Validators

- [Installation](https://pix-js.vercel.app/docs/getting-started/validators): Install guide for validators
- [Validate a PIX key](https://pix-js.vercel.app/docs/getting-started/validators/validate-pix-key)
- [Validate QR Code](https://pix-js.vercel.app/docs/getting-started/validators/validate-qrcode)
- [Validate CRC](https://pix-js.vercel.app/docs/getting-started/validators/validate-crc)
